sentences.sentence: Inscribers will create glyphs that allow players to modify their spells and abilities. (Eurogamer. net)
sentences.translation: 铭文师可以制造“雕文”（应该是可以交易的物品），让玩家修改他的技能和法术。

sentences.sentence: Added a new glyph of Claw for young feral druids who haven't yet obtained Mangle. Inscribers can learn this glyph from the trainer.
sentences.translation: 为还不会裂伤的幼龄德鲁伊添加新的爪击雕文，铭文师可在训练师处学到该铭文。
